name: Swarm, Vampire Blossom
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Petal Slashes
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 0 ft., one creature, in the swarm's space. 18 (4d8) slashing damage or 9 (2d8) slashing damage if the swarm has half its hp or fewer. Target must make a DC 13 Con save reducing its hp max by an amount equal to damage taken on a failed save or by half as much if made. This reduction lasts until creature finishes a long rest. Target dies if this reduces its hp max to 0.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on melee attack rolls vs. any creature that doesn't have all its hp.

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint by scent location of creatures that aren't constructs or undead within 30' of it. Swarm is otherwise blind.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from carpet of flower petals.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature's space and vice versa and swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny plant. Swarm can't regain hp or gain temp hp.
